xwikidoc.content:
meeting.livetable.doc.title = Workflow Name meeting.livetable.contributor = Contributors meeting.livetable.moderator = Moderators meeting.livetable.validator= Webmasters workflow.start.dostart = Start workflow workflow.start.template = Workflow workflow.start.template.hint = Workflow configuration to be used for the current page. workflow.start.locationPreview.label = Publish Location workflow.start.locationPreview.hint = Location in the page hierarchy where the published page will be created.
The location of the published page must be different from the location of the current page.
workflow.start.spaceReference.label = Parent workflow.start.spaceReference.hint = Parent of the published page. Leave empty for top level page. workflow.start.name.label = Name workflow.start.name.hint = Name of the published page workflow.start.name.placeholder=TargetPage workflow.start.advancedoptions.text=Use the advanced options to select the location of the published page and the workflow configuration associated to this page. workflow.start.advancedoptions.button=Advanced options workflow.title = Workflow workflow.currentStatus = Current status workflow.submitformoderation = Submit to moderation workflow.submitforvalidation = Validate workflow.refusemoderation = Refuse workflow.publish = Publish workflow.refusevalidation = Refuse workflow.unpublish = Unpublish workflow.archive = Archive workflow.publishfromarchive = Republish workflow.valid = Validate without publishing workflow.editDraft = Edit draft workflow.backtodraft = Move back to drafts workflow.panel.noContributionRight = You don't have the necessary privileges to contribute this document. workflow.panel.noModerationRight = This document has been submitted to moderation and it is not available for the moment. workflow.panel.noValidationRight = This document has been validated and sent to Webmasters for publication. workflow.panel.thisIsDraft = The current document is a draft. To access the published version, click the link below. workflow.panel.thisIsPublished = The current document is the published version. In order to edit it, use the draft version instead. workflow.panel.publishedVersion = Published version workflow.panel.draftVersion = Go to draft workflow.panel.editDraft = If you want to edit the document, click the following button to return to status draft. workflow.panel.alreadyExist = The location of the published document should be different from the current one. Use the advanced options to select a different location. workflow.panel.publish.hintLanguages = Publishing does not only publish the language variant that you currently see but all language variants of the document. workflow.panel.applications.label = Workflow PublicationWorkflow.PublicationWorkflowClass_status_draft = Draft PublicationWorkflow.PublicationWorkflowClass_status_moderating = Currently being moderated PublicationWorkflow.PublicationWorkflowClass_status_validating = Currently being validated PublicationWorkflow.PublicationWorkflowClass_status_valid = Validated PublicationWorkflow.PublicationWorkflowClass_status_published = Published PublicationWorkflow.PublicationWorkflowClass_status_archived = Archived PublicationWorkflow.PublicationWorkflowConfigClass_groupedit_hint = Edit Workflow Group PublicationWorkflow.PublicationWorkflowConfigClass_contributor = Contributors PublicationWorkflow.PublicationWorkflowConfigClass_moderator = Moderators PublicationWorkflow.PublicationWorkflowConfigClass_validator = Publishers PublicationWorkflow.PublicationWorkflowConfigClass_defaultDraftSpace = Default Draft Space workflow.script.notenoughparams = Not enough parameters. workflow.refusal.notenoughparams = Not enough parameters. workflow.refusal.message = Motivate your refusal here. workflow.refusal.submit = Refuse the document workflow.refusal.cancel = Cancel workflow.unpublish.noDiff = The draft and the published document are identical. Please confirm the unpublication. workflow.unpublish.diff = The draft is not identical to the published document. To override the draft, check the case below. workflow.unpublish.noDraft = Please confirm the unpublication. workflow.unpublish.submit = Unpublish workflow.unpublish.cancel = Cancel workflow.unpublish.crush = Override draft workflow.overview.title=Overview workflow.overview.listDrafts= List of draft documents : workflow.overview.noDraftDoc= There is no draft having you as contributor. workflow.overview.noWebmasterDoc = There is no document currently being validated of which you are a Webmaster workflow.overview.noModerationDoc = There is no document currently being moderated of which you are a moderator workflow.overview.publishAll = Publish all documents workflow.overview.validateAll = Validate all documents workflow.overview.listValidating = List of documents currently being validated : workflow.overview.listModerating = List of documents currently being moderated : workflow.overview.successPublish = All documents have been published workflow.overview.successValidate = All documents have been validated workflow.overview.failValidate = A problem occurred during the validation of document [[{0}]] workflow.overview.failPublish = A problem occurred during the publication of document [[{0}]] workflow.save.start = Start workflow {0} on document {1}. workflow.save.submitForModeration = Submit document {0} to moderation. workflow.save.refuseModeration = Moderation refused : {0} workflow.save.submitForValidation = Submit document {0} to validation. workflow.save.refuseValidation = Publication refused : {0} workflow.save.validate = Mark document {0} as valid. workflow.save.publishNew = Publication of the new version of the document by {0}. workflow.save.publishDraft = Publication of the document to {0}. workflow.save.createDraft= Creating draft for document {0}. workflow.save.unpublish = Creating draft from the published document {0}. workflow.save.backToDraft = Change the status to draft to allow editing. workflow.save.archive = Archive the document by {0}. workflow.save.publishFromArchive = Publication of the document from an archive by {0}. workflow.alert.publish = Are you sure you want to publish this document ? workflow.alert.archive = Are you sure you want to archive this document ? workflow.alert.yes = Yes workflow.alert.no = No workflow.move.updateDraft=The target was moved / renamed. Set the new location to {0}.
